
---------------------------
Wed Dec 03 00:15:25 BRST 2014Sql Execultadacom.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4PreparedStatement@11d0b89: SELECT professormateria.*,materia.nome as nomemateria,curso.nome as nomecurso,curso.id as idcurso
FROM professormateria,materia,curso 
where professormateria.idmateria=materia.id and materia.idcurso=curso.id and professormateria.idprofessor=3
---------------------------
Wed Dec 03 00:15:25 BRST 2014Sql Execultadacom.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4PreparedStatement@166a538: select h.id,h.idprofessor,h.idmateria from (select h.segunda,h.terca,h.quarta,h.quinta,h.sexta,h.sabado,h.domingo,s.id,s.idprofessor,s.idmateria from horarioaula h,professormateria s
where  h.segunda=s.id or h.terca=s.id or h.quarta=s.id or h.quinta=s.id
or h.sexta=s.id or h.sabado=s.id or h.domingo=s.id group by s.id) as h where h.idprofessor=3
---------------------------
Wed Dec 03 00:15:25 BRST 2014Sql Execultadacom.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4PreparedStatement@8c1ac9: SELECT professormateria.idprofessor,horarioprofessor.* FROM gerador.professormateria left join horarioprofessor 
on(professormateria.id=horarioprofessor.idprofessormateria) where idprofessor=3 group by inicio,termino
